msg: * since the information stored in allThreadsTransactionBeginStack and allThreadsTransactionBeginStackSave was only used when the log INFO level was ON, now they are not populated if it is OFF
* instead of reading the value of debugResources from EntityConfig everytime, now it does only at initialization
